name: Team Cubes
description:
Team Cubes - by Smoll Game

Team Cubes - is a small puzzle game where you should get out of the box and enter new level, but the problem is that you have a few cubes that don't let you get out. 

HOW TO PLAY?

W / S - You move yourself and the Blue Cubes

A / D - You move Yellow and Orange Cubes

YOUR MISSION

Your mission is to get out of box but there is cubes that don't let you get out.

There is 26 levels on Beta Early Access but on release there will be more.

Having troubles with completing?
A full tutorial video coming soon, when full release will come!
